name: Codemasters F1 2019
shortDescription: Stream Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix
longDescription: Stream Codemasters F1 2019 telemetry to Quix. This bridge is capable of streaming the game's telemetry from a PC or console. Note that this bridge must be run locally on a PC on the same network as the game

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: The topic where game data will be output.
